result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kristopher Robert Pittman

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:22 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi and Intern Lanie Krause in court for DE, Defendant Kristopher Robert Pittman in court, in custody. INCLUDES 22CM665 (INIT), 21CM528 (RW), 22CM95 (RW), 22CM349 (RW), 11FA473 (HE), 22TR3480 (IN), 22TR3481 (IN) and 22TR3482 (IN). INIT 22CM665: DE qualifies for public defender. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. NG. Court sets bond. 11FA473: Atty. Wagner requests $250 purge to be released. DE confirms address. Court orders $250 purge. QUASH WARRANT. Court sets Hearing. RW 21CM528, 22CM95 and 22CM349: QUASH WARRANTS. IN 22TR3480, 22TR3481 and 22TR3482: NG pleas. Court sets STC on all cases. Adjourned. kma
Per TCH. fax: Dispatch, Jail & SCSO. Includes 21CM528, 22CM95 & 22CM349. kma
Signed by SJN 10-7-22, c: SCSO e:DA. Statewide, Includes 21CM528, 22CM95 & 22CM349. cah

To include unpaid June through September, 2022, attorney fees totalling $200.00.  Defendant must appear before the Court and pay $200.00 purge before release.  **To appear in Branch 1 only**    Includes 21CM528, 22CM95 & 22CM349

2:17 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Kristopher Robert Pittman not in court.  Attorney Nicholas Von Davis in court for Kristopher Robert Pittman.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CM528, 21TR3223, 21TR3224, 21TR3225, 22CM095, 22CM349, 22TR1804.  Statewide body only, not in compliance with JSC testing.  Kelly from JSC is here in person and states DE has not tested for a few months. Atty Davis was in communication with him earlier and DE did state he would be here.  There is a Global Resolution on all files, Atty Davis needs time to discuss this resolution with him. Court issues body only WARRANT- Statewide, Branch 1 ONLY.  TR matters to continue to trail. Adjourned at 2:23 PM. bph
Status conference on October 7, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

1:58 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nicholas Von Davis appeared by video for Kristopher Robert Pittman. Defendant Kristopher Robert Pittman appeared by phone. INCLUDES 21CM528, 21TR3223, 21TR3224, 21TR3225, 22CM349 and 22TR1804. Set for STC. DE states that he is not currently in treatment. Court notes DE was not approved to appear by Zoom today and is required to appear in person at next hearing. Court reviews case. ADA Damrau notes some TR cases were previously defaulted, requests STC. Court sets STC, DE in person. Adjourned: 2:06 PM. kma
Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on September 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
of Absconder Status. Filed by JSC. SEALED. km       to kap
Status conference on September 22, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:19 AM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Brian Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kristopher Robert Pittman in court, Attorney Nicholas Von Davis in court for Kristopher Robert Pittman. INCLUDES 21CM528 (INIT), 21TR3223, 21TR3224, 21TR3225, 22CM95, 22CM349 and 22TR1804. Set for PLEAS. Atty. Davis states that these cases are not prepared to proceed to plea/sentencing today, DE has had positive drug test, DE is waiting on insurance to enter treatment, requests additional time to allow DE to enter treatment. 21CM528 (INIT): Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. NG. Atty. Davis to notify Court when DE is to enter treatment at treatment at L.E. Phillips, bond will be modified to indicate that testing is to be suspended at that time, testing to resume if DE is no longer in treatment. Court sets STC. Adjourned: 10:34 AM. kma
Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Pretrial Bond Report. Filed by JSC. SEALED. km          to kap
Filed by Atty Davis. km
Filed by ADA Brekken. km
Appointing Atty Davis. km
Per EFV.  gll
Pre-trial conference on July 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Bond to be cosigned by Ericka Keller.

Defendant to have baseline test prior to release.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to submit to random drug testing and ETG testing at least ONE time per week. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

01:53 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood  DF ATTY: Stephanie Schmidt for today   DF:  Kristopher Robert Pittman appeared from jail. Includes 22CM349 INIT and 22TR1804 IN. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. Bond argument; bond ordered. NG.  Reserve on pre-plea rights. Court judicially transfers cases to Branch 1 and sets PTC with Branch 1. Adjourned at 1:59 PM.  gll  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.
